short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hides whitespace changes in GitHub PR diffs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple browser extension that will automatically hide whitespaces for all your GitHub PRs.

At times, the whitespaces in the PRs can be distracting and make it difficult to read the code. This extension will help you focus on the code changes and not the whitespaces.

While GitHub has added support to remember whitespace settings for individual PRs,
they have yet to add user-level settings to control this across _all_ PRs.
